//   g_AffineMatrix c246     4

    vs_3_0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_texcoord v1
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1.xy
    mul r0, c247, v0.y
    mad r0, v0.x, c246, r0
    mad r0, v0.z, c248, r0
    add o0, r0, c249
    mov o1.xy, v1

// approximately 5 instruction slots used
